title: Security Preferences (com.apple.preference.security)
description: The payload that configures security preferences.

dontAllowPasswordResetUI.title: Allow user to change password
dontAllowPasswordResetUI.description: If 'true', disables user changes to the password.

dontAllowLockMessageUI.title: Allow user to set lock message
dontAllowLockMessageUI.description: If 'true', disables user changes to the lock message.

dontAllowFireWallUI.title: Disallow firewall setting modification
dontAllowFireWallUI.description: If 'true', disables user changes to the firewall settings.
